text:
A Thread Group reads a "CSV Data Set Config" and uses the same row in 2 different threads.  The "CSV Data Set Config" should only allow each row to be used once.

== Thread Group ==
* 14 threads
* 7 second ramp-up
* (1) HTTP Sampler
* (1) CSV Data Set Config

== CSV Data Set Config" ==
2.3 million lines in the file, no duplicate entries (checked with 'uniq').

* Sharing Mode:  Current Thread Group
* Recycle on EOF:  False
* Stop Thread on EOF:  True
creator: jerry@evri.com

text:
Hello,
Please attach a test plan that shows your issue.

Thank you
Regards
Philippe
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Hello,
Isn't this done by changing "Sharing Mode" to "All threads" ?
Requirement should be detailed a bit more by attaching test plan.


Regards
Philippe

Created attachment 27872
Test plan as described showing no issue
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com

text:

Please reopen issue with Test plan and data if you find this bug is still here.
